entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 06:38 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: E 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
